about_the_game:
• Fight against challenging bosses .
  • Control creatures that would attack you in other games.
  • Discover a whole new world and interact with it.
  • Solve puzzles in a very interactive way.
  • Find out how your choices affect your game.
  • Collect the hidden Hair Bows across the maps and see secret contents .



At the beginning of time, the forces of nature made everything that exists. Aether, the force of space, and Kronos, force of time, created all the reality we know. Selene, the force of night, created the phases of the moon. Gaia, the force of the life, created all living creatures and controlled them to make they live in harmony.



But that harmony ended when Nix, the force of chaos, created the disagreement and discord, breaking Gaia's controls over her children. Because of this, a war has started and now Nix have to fight against all the other forces of nature.
